name: Woods of Death 2
description:
Woods Of Death 2 is an RPG where you fight off 60 enemies in the woods! Then you fight off 3 bosses to beat the game.

It's unique as it has a bank, a blacksmith, a card shop, various drops, and bonuses for ability points that you can spend in the Training Center.
There is also a Weapon Shop and an Armor Shop.

Every level has a different soundtrack, background, and enemy!
Choose between 6 character classes (Cleric, Warlock, Sorceror, Warrior, Palidan, or Rogue) or play them all!
This game can be played casually and the bank runs even when you are not playing the game.

Several Steam Achievements included!

Have fun!
